00047 // This is the maximum size of a zoomlevel of a map, 
00048 #define MAX_BUFFER_SIZE 150000000
00049 // Max size of a zoomlevel of a super overview map (level 2 overview map)
00050 // (0x90000000 or greater)
00051 #define MAX_BUFFER_SIZE_SUPER_OVERVIEW 450000000

02449 inline const map<OldGenericMap::multiNodes_t, OldGenericMap::expandedNodes_t>*
02450 OldGenericMap::getNodeExpansionTable() const
02451 {
02452    return &m_nodeExpansionTable;

02454 
02455 inline uint32 
02456 OldGenericMap::getNbrItemsWithZoom(uint32 z) const 
02457 {
02458    if (z<NUMBER_GFX_ZOOMLEVELS)
02459       return (m_itemsZoomSize[z]);
02460    else
02461       return (0);
02462 }
02463 
02464 inline uint32 
02465 OldGenericMap::getNbrItems() const 
02466 {
02467    uint32 retVal = 0;
02468    for (uint32 z = 0; z < NUMBER_GFX_ZOOMLEVELS; z++)
02469       retVal += m_itemsZoomSize[z];
02470    return (retVal);
02471 }
02472 
02473 inline OldItem* 
02474 OldGenericMap::getItem(uint32 zoom, uint32 index) const 
02475 {
02476    if (index < getNbrItemsWithZoom(zoom))
02477       return (m_itemsZoom[zoom][index]);
02478    else
02479       return (NULL);
02480 }
02481 
02482 inline OldItem*
02483 OldGenericMap::itemLookup(uint32 itemID) const 
02484 {
02485    if ((itemID & 0x07ffffff) < 
02486       getNbrItemsWithZoom((itemID & 0x78000000) >> 27))
02487       return m_itemsZoom[(itemID & 0x78000000) >> 27]
02488                       [itemID & 0x07ffffff];
02489    else
02490       return NULL;
02491 }

02494 OldGenericMap::getGfxData() const
02495 {
02496    // we do know what this is
02497    return static_cast<GMSGfxData*>(m_gfxData);
02498 }

02500 OldGenericMap::getGfxData()
02501 {
02502    // we do know what this is
02503    return static_cast<GMSGfxData*>(m_gfxData);

02536 
02537 inline const char* 
02538 OldGenericMap::getFirstItemName(const OldItem* item) const 
02539 {
02540    // Make sure that nothing is null
02541    if ((item == NULL) || (m_itemNames == NULL)) {
02542       return (NULL);
02543    }
02544 
02545    // Return the name, if any -- otherwise "MISSING"
02546    if (item->getNbrNames() > 0)
02547       return (m_itemNames->getString(item->getStringIndex(0)));
02548    else  
02549       return (m_itemNames->getString(0));
02550       // Does not work for co map, where "MISSING" is not stored.
02551 }
02552 
02553 inline const char* 
02554 OldGenericMap::getFirstItemName(uint32 itemID) const 
02555 {
02556    return (getFirstItemName(itemLookup(itemID)));
02557 }
02558 
02559 inline const char* 
02560 OldGenericMap::getName(uint32 stringIndex) const
02561 {
02562    if (m_itemNames != NULL) {
02563       return (m_itemNames->getString(stringIndex));
02564    } else {
02565       return (NULL);
02566    }
02567 }
02568 
02569 inline const char*
02570 OldGenericMap::getRawName(uint32 rawIndex) const
02571 {
02572    if ( rawIndex == MAX_UINT32 ) {
02573       return NULL;
02574    } else {
02575       return getName(GET_STRING_INDEX(rawIndex));
02576    }
02577 }
02578 
02579 inline const char* 
02580 OldGenericMap::getBestItemName(const OldItem* item, 
02581                             LangTypes::language_t strLang) const
02582 {
02583 #if 1
02584    if ((item == NULL) || (item->getNbrNames() == 0)) {
02585       return NULL;
02586    }
02587    return getRawName(item->getBestRawName(strLang));
02588 #else
02589    vector<LangTypes::language_t> strLangs;
02590    strLangs.push_back(strLang);
02591    // Use English as default language
02592    if (strLang != LangTypes::english) {
02593       strLangs.push_back(LangTypes::english);
02594    }
02595    return getBestItemName(item, strLangs);
02596 #endif
02597 }
02598 
02599 inline const char* 
02600 OldGenericMap::getBestItemName(const OldItem* item, 
02601                             vector<LangTypes::language_t> &strLang) const
02602 {
02603    // Make sure we have anything
02604    if ((item == NULL) || (item->getNbrNames() == 0)) {
02605       return NULL;
02606    }
02607 
02608 #if 1
02609    // getRawName will return NULL if the index is MAX_UINT32
02610    return getRawName(item->getBestRawName(strLang));
02611 #else
02612    
02613    // 1. Official name
02614    const char* retVal = getBestItemName(item, ItemTypes::officialName, 
02615                                         strLang);
02616    if (retVal != NULL) {
02617       return retVal;
02618    }
02619 
02620    // 2. Alternative name in requested language, return when/if found!
02621    retVal = getBestItemName(item, ItemTypes::alternativeName, strLang);
02622    if (retVal != NULL) {
02623       return retVal;
02624    }
02625 
02626    // 3. Any name in requested language, return when/if found!
02627    retVal = getBestItemName(item, ItemTypes::invalidName, strLang);
02628    if (retVal != NULL) {
02629       return retVal;
02630    }
02631 
02632    // 4. Any name (the first one)
02633    return getName(item->getRawStringIndex(0));
02634 #endif
02635 }
02636 
02637 inline const char* 
02638 OldGenericMap::getBestItemName(uint32 itemID) const
02639 {
02640    return (getBestItemName(itemID, LangTypes::invalidLanguage));
02641 }
02642 
02643 inline const char* 
02644 OldGenericMap::getBestItemName(uint32 itemID, LangTypes::language_t strLang) const
02645 {
02646    return (getBestItemName(itemLookup(itemID), strLang));
02647 }
02648 
02649 inline const char* 
02650 OldGenericMap::getBestItemName(uint32 itemID, 
02651                             vector<LangTypes::language_t> &strLang) const
02652 {
02653    return (getBestItemName(itemLookup(itemID), strLang));
02654 }
02655 
02656 
02657 inline const char* 
02658 OldGenericMap::getBestItemName(const OldItem* item, 
02659                             ItemTypes::name_t strType,
02660                             LangTypes::language_t strLang) const
02661 {
02662 #if 1
02663    if ((item == NULL) || (item->getNbrNames() == 0)) {
02664       return NULL;
02665    }
02666    return getRawName(item->getBestRawNameOfType(strType, strLang) );
02667 #else
02668    vector<LangTypes::language_t> strLangs;
02669    strLangs.push_back(strLang);
02670    // Use English as default language
02671    if (strLang != LangTypes::english) {
02672       strLangs.push_back(LangTypes::english);
02673    }
02674    return getBestItemName(item, strType, strLangs);
02675 #endif
02676 }
02677 
02678 inline const char* 
02679 OldGenericMap::getBestItemName(const OldItem* item, 
02680                             ItemTypes::name_t strType,
02681                             vector<LangTypes::language_t> &strLang) const
02682 {
02683 #if 1
02684    if ((item == NULL) || (item->getNbrNames() == 0)) {
02685       return NULL;
02686    }
02687    return getRawName(item->getBestRawNameOfType(strType, strLang));
02688 #else
02689    uint32 i = 0;
02690    // In requested language, return when/if found!
02691    while (i < strLang.size()) {
02692       uint32 strIndex = item->getNameWithType(strType, strLang[i]);
02693       if (strIndex != MAX_UINT32) {
02694          return getName(strIndex);
02695       }
02696       ++i;
02697    }
02698 
02699    // Try any language
02700    uint32 strIndex = item->getNameWithType(strType, 
02701                                            LangTypes::invalidLanguage);
02702    if (strIndex != MAX_UINT32) {
02703       return getName(strIndex);
02704    }
02705    
02706    return NULL;
02707 #endif
02708 }
02709 
02710 
02711 inline const char* 
02712 OldGenericMap::getItemName( OldItem* item,
02713                          LangTypes::language_t strLang,
02714                          ItemTypes::name_t strType ) const 
02715 {
02716    if ( item == NULL || m_itemNames == NULL ) {
02717       return NULL;
02718    }
02719 #if 1
02720    return getRawName(item->getBestRawName(strLang, strType));
02721 #else
02722    // Get the name with correct type and language
02723    uint32 stringIndex = item->getNameWithType(strType, strLang);
02724 
02725    // Try the languages of the map
02726    if (m_nativeLanguages != NULL) {
02727       uint32 mapLangNbr = 0;
02728       while ( (stringIndex == MAX_UINT32) && 
02729               (mapLangNbr < m_nativeLanguages->getSize())) {
02730          stringIndex = item->getNameWithType(strType, 
02731                LangTypes::language_t(m_nativeLanguages->
02732                   getElementAt(mapLangNbr)));
02733          mapLangNbr++;
02734       }
02735    }
02736 
02737    // Try english
02738    if ((stringIndex == MAX_UINT32) && (strLang != LangTypes::english))
02739       stringIndex = item->getNameWithType(strType, LangTypes::english);
02740 
02741    // Take the first name with correct type
02742    if (stringIndex == MAX_UINT32) 
02743       stringIndex = item->getNameWithType(strType, LangTypes::invalidLanguage);
02744 
02745    // Take the first name with any type
02746    if (stringIndex == MAX_UINT32) 
02747       stringIndex = item->getNameWithType(ItemTypes::invalidName,
02748                                           LangTypes::invalidLanguage);
02749 
02750    // Return the found name (or NULL if stringIndex == MAX_UINT32)
02751    return m_itemNames->getString(stringIndex);
02752 #endif
02753 }
02754 
02755 inline const char* 
02756 OldGenericMap::getItemName( uint32 itemID,
02757                          LangTypes::language_t strLang,
02758                          ItemTypes::name_t strType ) const 
02759 {
02760    return getItemName( itemLookup( itemID ), strLang, strType );
02761 }

02763 inline OldBoundrySegmentsVector* 
02764 OldGenericMap::getBoundrySegments() const 
02765 {
02766    return m_segmentsOnTheBoundry;
02767 }
